page.title: 19People & Attitudes in Felton
page.content: The area has retained its rural character. The villages are small and hidden down narrow, winding lanes. The houses are old, half-timbered, stone or brick. The people are descendants of old Herefordian families carrying on traditional farming occupations, although increasingly people are moving in from Hereford or beyond. Most of these incomers work locally or travel to work in Hereford. The local inhabitants are friendly to newcomers and readily absorb them into the community. These newcomers have generally bought properties in need of renovation. The local people are generally conservative in their attitudes and traditional in their persuits and way of life.
